overview.heading: Brighton Virtual Office
overview.body: Get your hands on a prime Brighton business address without the hefty price tag of a physical office. With Opus VO, you can establish your enterprise right in the heart of Brighton’s dynamic commercial district, all on a budget-friendly scale. Need to impress in a meeting or make a client connection? Our state-of-the-art conference rooms are at your service. And let’s face it—a Brighton address is a pretty sweet addition to your brand’s image.  Choose the virtual route in Brighton via Opus VO, and you’ll also receive the bonus of a live receptionist committed to making each client encounter a seamless fit with your individual business flair. Offload those pesky administrative duties to us and unleash yourself to focus on what you love—building your business.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Brighton, Colorado even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Brighton. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Colorado.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Brighton virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.
